Cougaar 12.7

Uses of Class
org.cougaar.mts.base.StandardAspect

Packages that use StandardAspect
org.cougaar.core.qos.gossip The Gossip subsystem allows Metrics collected on one Node to be disseminated to other Nodes in the society. 
org.cougaar.core.qos.tmatrix   
org.cougaar.mts.base This package contains the core software components and infrastructure for the full Message Transport Service, including interceptor Stations, base classes, MTS services, mandatory Aspects, and loopback LinkProtocol. 
org.cougaar.mts.corba This package contains the software components needed for the CORBA Link Protocol. 
org.cougaar.mts.rmi This package contains the RMI and RMI-SSL link protocols. 
org.cougaar.mts.std This package contains optional MTS software components that are used for a production Cougaar runtime. 
org.cougaar.mts.std.debug This package contains optional MTS components used for debugging and testing Cougaar internals. 
org.cougaar.mts.std.experimental This package contains experimental MTS software components that extend the behavior of the MTS.

          Central Aspect for transfering Metrics between Nodes.

Uses of StandardAspect in org.cougaar.mts.rmi
 

Subclasses of StandardAspect in org.cougaar.mts.rmi
 class EnableRmiSenderSideAspect
          Sample Aspect that will disable all of RMI for 30 seconds (by default) after a failure.
 class RMISocketControlAspect
          This Aspect creates a ServiceProvider for and implementation of the RMISocketControlService.
 class RMITestAspect
          This test Aspect uses the RMISocketControlService to set socket timeouts.
 

Uses of StandardAspect in org.cougaar.mts.std
 

Subclasses of StandardAspect in org.cougaar.mts.std
 class AgentStatusAspect
          This Aspect implements the AgentStatusService.
 class ChecksumStreamsAspect
          This class provides an example of adding trailers to serialized AttributedMessages.
 class CountBytesStreamsAspect
          This Aspect counts the bytes of an outgoing message flowing by and sets a local attribute org.cougaar.core.message.count with the final value.
 class DeliveryVerificationAspect
          This Aspect logs the delivery of messages, as well as the delay if the delivery takes awhile.
 class DetectBigMessageAspect
          This Aspect logs large messages, where large is defined by the MaxMsgLen parameter as a threshold number of bytes.
 class DirectiveAckAspect
          After delivering a DirectiveMessage with a non-null value for the AttributeConstants.RECEIPT_REQUESTED attribute, try to inject a receipt message back to the sending Agent contain the reply status for each RelayDirective it contains.
 class MessageSendTimeAspect
          Aspect that tags all messages with a "send time" attribute when they enter the MTS SendLink.
 class MessageTimeoutAspect
          Aspect to throw out a timed out message.
 class MulticastAspect
          This Aspect provides support for multicast messages.
 class OldIncarnationAspect
          This Aspect assists in the detection of out-of-date incarnations of Agents.
 class OutOfBandMessageAspect
          Service provider and implementation for OutOfBandMessageService
 class PreserializingStreamsAspect
          This test Aspect preserializes messages into a byte array, sends the array instead of the message over the RMI stream, and then deserializes on the other end.
 class SequenceAspect
          This Aspect adds sequence numbers to messages, and enforces sequencing based on those numbers.
 class StatisticsAspect
          This Aspect gathers message size and count statistics using the InputStream and OutputStream of streamed protocols.
 class WatcherAspect
          This Aspect is used in conjunction with MessageWatcherServiceImpl, the implementaion of the MessageWatcherService.
 

Uses of StandardAspect in org.cougaar.mts.std.debug
 

Subclasses of StandardAspect in org.cougaar.mts.std.debug
 class ForwardMessageLoggingAspect
          This test Aspect logs all outgoing messages, including in each log the source and destination Agent, the destination Node, and the destination Host.
 class MessageTraceAspect
          This test Aspect logs message delivery elapsed time.
 class MetricsBlastTestAspect
          This test Aspect throws lots of data into the metrics service and subscrobes to a formula which uses that data.
 class MetricsTestAspect
          This test Aspect queries and updates the metric service on every message send.
 class ScrambleAspect
          This test Aspect scrambles the order of messages.
 class SerializationAspect
          This is debugging Aspect forces serialization on the LoopbackLinkProtocol.
 class ServiceTestAspect
          This test Aspect is an example of using a LinkProtocol-specific service.
 class StepperAspect
          This Aspect includes the ServiceProvider for and implementation of the StepService, as well as a use of that service in a Swing gui.
 class StepperControlExampleAspect
          This example Aspect shows a simple use of the StepService.
 class StubDumperAspect
          This debugging Aspect logs URIs and stubs of local and remote references, respectively.
 class TraceAspect
          This demonstration Aspect provides a simple trace of a message as it passes through the various stages of the message transport subsystem.
 class WasteCPUAspect
          This debugging Aspect deliberately delays message processing by wasting CPU for pseudo-random durations.
 class ZinkyMessageTraceAspect

 class HeartBeatAspect
          This test Aspect sends periodic 'heartbeat' messages to a specified destination, as given by the dstAddr parameter.
 class PrioritizedThreadsAspect
          Not an aspect, but the aspect mechanism provides a simple way to load classes on demand.
